page.title: 12CHURCH ON RHUM
page.content:
The church on Rhum is a member of the Church of Scotland. It is part of the Parish of Mallaig and the Small Isles.
The minister, who is based in Mallaig, visits Eigg, Rhum, Muck and Canna as part of his Parish. The usual minister can't always make it because he has such a large Parish to cover so other ministers from the Presbytery visit the island. They visit Rhum once a month during the winter on a Wednesday evening and stay till the following morning. In the summer the minister comes fortnightly.
Weddings and baptisms are also held.
The church service is held in one half of the school building which is situated on the southern shore of Loch Scresort.
